name: Burger King
description: Burger King is known for its flame-grilled burgers and delicious fries. With a diverse menu and quick service, it's a favorite among many.

name: McDonald's
description: McDonald's offers a wide range of fast food options, from classic burgers to breakfast items. Known for its convenience and quick meals.

comments.text: The service can be slow during peak hours.

name: La Petite Creperie
description: La Petite Creperie serves delightful French crepes filled with sweet or savory ingredients. A cozy spot for a taste of France.

name: Sushi Palace
description: Sushi Palace is a haven for sushi enthusiasts, offering a vast selection of fresh sushi rolls and sashimi.

name: Mama Rosa's Italian Kitchen
description: Mama Rosa's Italian Kitchen crafts authentic Italian dishes with homemade sauces and traditional recipes.
